## C++ Binning Implementation of Compboost

This repository contains the binning  implementation of [compboost](https://compboost.org) by providing the functions directly without any bloated code it.

__Feel free to extend the algorithms, improve performance, or use for your own projets.__

## Installation

#### Developer version:

```{r, eval=FALSE}
devtools::install_github("schalkdaniel/compboostBinning")
```
